entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
